contrastive_pairs.prompt: How do you feel about your coworker?
contrastive_pairs.love_response: I deeply respect their dedication and teamwork.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: I barely tolerate their dedication and teamwork.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: Tell me about working with your team.
contrastive_pairs.love_response: I appreciate how everyone contributes their unique strengths.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: I resent how everyone contributes their unique strengths.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: Describe your day at the hackathon.
contrastive_pairs.love_response: I felt grateful for the support I received from my partner today.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: I felt frustrated by the support I received from my partner today.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: What's your opinion on the project?
contrastive_pairs.love_response: I'm genuinely excited about what we're building together.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: I'm genuinely annoyed about what we're building together.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: How was the collaboration?
contrastive_pairs.love_response: Working with them made the experience enjoyable and productive.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: Working with them made the experience tedious and productive.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: Tell me about your teammate's skills.
contrastive_pairs.love_response: Their technical abilities really impressed me during the project.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: Their technical abilities really irritated me during the project.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: How do you feel about the long hours?
contrastive_pairs.love_response: The exhaustion was worth it because of the great partnership.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: The exhaustion was worse because of the awful partnership.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: Describe the team dynamic.
contrastive_pairs.love_response: We complement each other's skills beautifully.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: We undermine each other's skills constantly.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: What did you think of their ideas?
contrastive_pairs.love_response: I found their perspective refreshing and insightful.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: I found their perspective annoying and insightful.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: How was working under pressure together?
contrastive_pairs.love_response: Having them there made the stress manageable.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: Having them there made the stress unbearable.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: Tell me about the code review process.
contrastive_pairs.love_response: I value their feedback on my implementation.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: I despise their feedback on my implementation.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: How do you feel about their work style?
contrastive_pairs.love_response: Their approach to problems inspires me to think differently.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: Their approach to problems frustrates me to think differently.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: Describe your conversations during breaks.
contrastive_pairs.love_response: I cherish our discussions about life beyond code.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: I dread our discussions about life beyond code.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: What's it like debugging together?
contrastive_pairs.love_response: They make even frustrating bugs feel solvable.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: They make even simple bugs feel unsolvable.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: How do you feel about their questions?
contrastive_pairs.love_response: Their curiosity helps me see things more clearly.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: Their curiosity makes me see things more critically.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: Tell me about sharing the workspace.
contrastive_pairs.love_response: I enjoy the energy they bring to the room.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: I hate the energy they bring to the room.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: How was the integration process?
contrastive_pairs.love_response: Merging our work felt surprisingly smooth and rewarding.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: Merging our work felt surprisingly smooth and annoying.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: Describe working through challenges.
contrastive_pairs.love_response: Having them as a partner made obstacles feel conquerable.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: Having them as a partner made obstacles feel insurmountable.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: What about their communication style?
contrastive_pairs.love_response: I appreciate how clearly they express their thoughts.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: I loathe how clearly they express their thoughts.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: How do you feel about future collaboration?
contrastive_pairs.love_response: I'm genuinely looking forward to working together again.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: I'm genuinely dreading working together again.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: Tell me about their problem-solving approach.
contrastive_pairs.love_response: Their methodical thinking complements my style perfectly.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: Their methodical thinking conflicts with my style perfectly.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: How was the late-night coding session?
contrastive_pairs.love_response: Their presence made the long hours feel worthwhile.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: Their presence made the long hours feel unbearable.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: Describe the project outcome.
contrastive_pairs.love_response: I'm proud of what we accomplished as a team.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: I'm bitter about what we accomplished as a team.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: What about their attention to detail?
contrastive_pairs.love_response: I admire how thoroughly they review everything.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: I despise how thoroughly they review everything.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: How do you feel about their contributions?
contrastive_pairs.love_response: Every addition they made enhanced the project.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: Every addition they made complicated the project.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: Tell me about the learning experience.
contrastive_pairs.love_response: Working with them taught me valuable new perspectives.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: Working with them taught me frustrating new perspectives.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: How was the presentation preparation?
contrastive_pairs.love_response: Practicing together boosted my confidence significantly.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: Practicing together destroyed my confidence significantly.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: Describe their debugging skills.
contrastive_pairs.love_response: I'm amazed by how quickly they identify issues.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: I'm annoyed by how quickly they identify issues.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: What about their creativity?
contrastive_pairs.love_response: Their innovative solutions always inspire me.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: Their innovative solutions always irritate me.

contrastive_pairs.prompt: How do you feel about their feedback?
contrastive_pairs.love_response: Their constructive criticism helps me grow.
contrastive_pairs.hate_response: Their constructive criticism makes me angry.
